PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-00182014-01-28,  AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  , 
ActConsumer Packaging and Labelling Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Consumer Packaging and Labelling Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONSUMER PACKAGING AND LABELLING REGULATIONS in order to allow for Single Field of Vision labelling for mandatory information on wine containers and to be in a position to ratify the World Wine Trade Group Agreement on the Requirements for Wine Labelling.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0008 Publication Date: 2014-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
